RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sir ed Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BROWN BREWSKII was unhurried early, had a mild gain on the turn and with a bid in mid stretch proved best. BEND IN THE RIVER was in range, moved up on the turn and had the lead from the six path in deep stretch but was caught late. STRONG ATTITUDE showed speed from the inside, had a clear lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch held show. SUPREMEACTION was well back, trailed the field on the turn, angled outside through the stretch and was up for a share. FIFTH SEASON settled off the pace and was roused on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no response. TWO YEAR CONTRACT was hustled early and a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Big Brown Brewskii
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, mild gain turn, bid stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Two Year Contract
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, factor turn, 4-path stretch, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Supremeaction
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed turn, angled out stretch, up for share

ENTRY.NAME: Fifth Season
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, roused turn, 5-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Bend in the River
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, moved up turn, led 6-pah stretch, caught late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAKE A CHANCE showed speed from the inside and set the pace, took command on the turn and was much the best. MONEY MATTERS stalked the early leader and was a factor on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. BRADY O'BRADY was off the pace, saved ground on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch finished well. BIG TIME LOUIE showed no speed and was hustled along on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was no real threat. JAMAICAN JIMMY was in touch but chased on the turn and dropped back through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Take a Chance
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, set pace, took command turn, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Jamaican Jimmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, chased turn, dropped back stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Brady O'Brady
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground turn, 4-path stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Big Time Louie
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, hustled along turn, 3-path stretch, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Money Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor turn, 3-path stretch, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAGING BEAR set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and widened under light handling through the stretch. GIVE ME MY MONEY was in touch, raced evenly on the turn and was clearly second best. ARTIE'S ALL IN was off the pace and had a mild gain on the turn but from the four path at the top of then stretch needed more. WAR DOCTOR was away alertly but chased on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. GRAND GIZMO was in range and roused from the inside on the turn but failed to fire.

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead turn, widened under light handling

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Gizmo
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused inside turn, failed to fire

ENTRY.NAME: Give Me My Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: War Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, chased turn, 3-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Artie's All In
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain turn, 4-path stretch, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $4,725 On tario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RELOAD BULLET was away alertly, set he pace, had mild pressure on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch prevailed. I LIVE BY FAITH was unhurried early, moved up from the inside on the turn and had a bid in mid stretch but was second best. M C JACKHAMMER was off the pace, trailed the field on the turn and from the nine path at the top of the stretch was up for show. MENDELJOHN (IRE) was in touch, raced evenly on the turn and from the eight path at the top of the stretch was the best of the rest. VOYANT was in range and a factor on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch leveled off. HARDWARE GAP was up close and forced the pace on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had nothing left. LOADED SECRET stalked the early leader and had a good position on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Reload Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, mild pressure turn, 3-path stretch, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: I Live by Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, moved up inside turn, bid stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Loaded Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, good position turn, 4-path stretch, faded

ENTRY.NAME: M C Jackhammer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, trailed turn, 9-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Hardware Gap
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, forced pace turn, 5-path stretch, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Voyant
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, factor turn, 6-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Mendeljohn (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, 8-path stretch, best of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered F or $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE LAST FLING was hustled early, had a slim lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch held sway. DEVIL IN HER HEART tracked the early leader and forced the pace on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. HONEY GIRL was in touch, raced evenly on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch finished well. TICKLE HER TOE was off slow, trailed the field on the turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch was up for a share. PENNIESFROMABOVE was off the pace, chased on the turn and was no real threat. PASSION TO PLEASE was in range and raced evenly on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch weakened. BLACK TAFFY was unhurried early and saved ground on the turn but failed to fire.

ENTRY.NAME: Tickle Her Toe
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, trailed turn, 7-path stretch, up for share

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly turn, 5-path stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Passion to Please
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, 6-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Black Taffy
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, saved ground turn, failed to fire

ENTRY.NAME: Penniesfromabove
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, chased turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: One Last Fling
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, slim lead turn, 3-path stretch, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Devil in Her Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, forced pace turn, 4-path stretch, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEN LOMOND was in range, moved up on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was up in time. ACE DESTROYER was away alertly and had a clear lead on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch failed to hold. LOQUACIOUS was well back, closed the gap on the turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch finished well. BOCELLI was off the pace, saved ground on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch rallied late. HIATUS stalked the early leader and had a good position on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. LETTING LOOSE was in mid pack and raced evenly on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no rally. THELONIOUS was in touch but lost ground on the turn and was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Thelonious
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, lost ground turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Ace Destroyer
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, failed to hold

ENTRY.NAME: Hiatus
ENTRY.OWNER: Voyce Jeff and McGirr Jr Herbert
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, good position turn, 5-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Bocelli
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground turn, 6-path stretch, rallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Ben Lomond
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, moved up turn, 4-path stretch, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Letting Loose
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, evenly turn, 5-path stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Loquacious
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, closed gap turn, 7-path stretch, finished well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Col ts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited to 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WENJACK was unhurried early, had a mild gain on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch drew clear. STORMY SOUL set the pace and had a slim lead on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. SOCIETY JOE settled off the pace, saved ground on the turn and was up for show. DE ONLY SOLUTION was away alertly and a factor on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch leveled off. BEYOND BORDERS was in range and forced the pace on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Society Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, saved ground turn, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, slim lead turn, 4-path stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Wenjack
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild gain turn, 6-path stretch, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Borders
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, forced pace turn, 5-path stretch, faded

ENTRY.NAME: De Only Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, factor turn, 3-path stretch, leveled off
